statements: SELECT * FROM Train_Performance;
SELECT train_id, date, speed FROM Train_Performance WHERE delay_minutes > 0;
SELECT route_id, date, speed FROM Train_Performance WHERE speed >= 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT train_id, route_id, delay_minutes  FROM Train_Performance WHERE route_id = 123 AND time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT AVG(speed) AS average_speed FROM Train_Performance;
SELECT train_id, route_id, date, time, speed, delay_minutes FROM Train_Performance WHERE speed > 100 ORDER BY date DESC, time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT train_id, route_id, speed FROM Train_Performance WHERE delay_minutes > 30 ORDER BY speed ASC, date ASC;
SELECT train_id, count(*) as num_records FROM Train_Performance GROUP BY train_id HAVING num_records > 5 ORDER BY num_records DESC;
SELECT route_id, AVG(speed) as avg_speed FROM Train_Performance GROUP BY route_id HAVING avg_speed < 80 ORDER BY avg_speed ASC;
SELECT train_id, date, time, delay_minutes FROM Train_Performance WHERE date > '2022-01-01' AND delay_minutes > 0 ORDER BY date ASC, time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM trains WHERE train_id = 1;
SELECT train_name, arrival_time, departure_time FROM trains WHERE route_id = 5;
SELECT route_name, start_station, end_station FROM routes WHERE distance_km > 100;
SELECT train_name, route_id, arrival_time, departure_time FROM trains WHERE train_id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT * FROM trains INNER JOIN routes ON trains.route_id = routes.route_id;
SELECT train_id, train_name, route_id, arrival_time, departure_time FROM trains;
SELECT train_name, departure_time, arrival_time, route_id, train_id FROM trains;
SELECT * FROM trains WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_station, end_station, distance_km FROM routes WHERE distance_km >= 100;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_station, end_station FROM routes WHERE end_station = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Trains
SELECT train_name, manufacturer FROM Trains
SELECT route_name, distance_km FROM Routes
SELECT train_name, manufacturer, capacity FROM Trains
SELECT performance_id, speed_kmh, delay_minutes FROM PerformanceData
SELECT * FROM Trains WHERE capacity > 500 ORDER BY production_year DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT train_name, manufacturer FROM Trains WHERE manufacturer = 'XYZ Corp'
SELECT train_name, route_name, speed_kmh FROM Trains JOIN PerformanceData ON Trains.train_id = PerformanceData.train_id WHERE speed_kmh > 100 ORDER BY speed_kmh DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT train_name, manufacturer, distance_km FROM Trains JOIN Routes ON Trains.train_id = Routes.route_id WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company' ORDER BY distance_km ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Trains JOIN PerformanceData ON Trains.train_id = PerformanceData.train_id WHERE delay_minutes > 10 ORDER BY delay_minutes DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM trains ORDER BY train_name DESC;
SELECT train_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM trains WHERE train_type = 'Express';
SELECT station_name, location FROM stations WHERE location LIKE '%city%';
SELECT route_name, distance FROM routes WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT train_name, route_name, date FROM trains JOIN performance_data ON trains.train_id = performance_data.train_id WHERE speed > 120;
SELECT * FROM trains WHERE train_type='Express';
SELECT train_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM trains ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT route_name, distance FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT train_name, route_name, speed FROM trains t INNER JOIN performance_data pd ON t.train_id = pd.train_id WHERE speed >= 120 ORDER BY speed DESC;
SELECT station_name, location FROM stations WHERE station_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM trains;
SELECT train_name, start_time FROM trains WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, distance FROM routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT train_name, route_name, speed FROM trains JOIN performance_data ON trains.train_id = performance_data.train_id WHERE speed > 100;
SELECT station_name, arrival_time, departure_time FROM stations JOIN train_station_mapping ON stations.station_id = train_station_mapping.station_id WHERE train_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM trains;
SELECT train_id, train_name, route_id FROM trains ORDER BY train_id DESC;
SELECT route_id, route_name, distance FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY route_name;
SELECT performance_id, train_id, route_id, date, speed FROM performance_data WHERE speed > 200 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT mapping_id, train_id, station_id, arrival_time, departure_time FROM train_station_mapping ORDER BY arrival_time ASC;
